titleStmt.title: The wicked plots, and perfidious practises of the Spaniards, against the 17. provinces of the Netherlands, before they tooke up arms. Being gathered out of severall Dutch writers, by a lover of truth, and an unfained hater of oppression and tyrannie, the bane of commonwealths: [text defaced]
titleStmt.author: Scott, Thomas, 1580?-1626.

notesStmt.note: A lover of truth = Thomas Scott.
Imperfect: third sentence of caption title defaced; unable to supply, as anr. cop. also defaced.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
